description:
Ebisu is an elite Jounin tutor; he also serves as the personal tutor to the http://anidb.net/ch8865 [Third Hokage]`s grandson http://anidb.net/ch10931 [Konohamaru].
Like many in the village, Ebisu saw http://anidb.net/ch226 [Naruto] as the Kyuubi himself. Over time, though, Naruto`s hard work impressed Ebisu and he acknowledged that Naruto could be a good role model for Konohamaru.
name: Ebisu
